# Global Setup
```{r setup, include=TRUE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
library(knitr)
library(markdown)
```

# Example Code
```{r R code example, include=TRUE, echo=FALSE}
# anything you write in here is r-code and will not be executed
# include = false will run but not show in back ground
# echo can show output
summary(mtcars)
```

# Example Figure
```{r include figures}
data("mtcars")
ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +
  geom_smooth(method = lm, se = FALSE) +
  geom_point(aes(color = wt)) +
  xlab("Weight") + 
  ylab("Miles per gallon") +
  scale_colour_gradient(low = "forestgreen", high = "black")
```
